title: Billed twice for one RP purchase
body: I spent 5$ on a RP purchase and got billed twice.

replies.body:
Ooof, that's not supposed to happen at all! We'll take care of this if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing specialists can take a look.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Ooof, that's not supposed to happen at all! We'll take care of this if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing specialists can take a look.
